data.title: Manian - Songs, Events and Music Stats
data.meta_description: Manian: Listen to new and popular songs, find events, look into their stats and see who their fans are.
data.text:
German electronic music producer Manian is well-known for his work in the hardstyle and hardcore subgenres. German electronic musician Manian, who was born in Bonn, is renowned for his upbeat beats and memorable melodies. Manian has been producing music for over ten years.

Manian is known for being a pioneer in the hardstyle and hardcore movements. His music is frequently distinguished by its frantic rhythms and strong basslines. His music has established itself as a mainstay in clubs and festivals all over the world because of the way his tunes are made to get people up and moving while keeping them there.

Manian continues to be committed to his craft despite his success, always expanding the realm of what is conceivable in electronic music. He is a true pioneer in the field, and a new generation of DJs and producers of electronic music continues to be influenced by his music.

German electronic musician Manian, who is from Bonn, has created some of the most well-known songs in the subgenre. The timeless song "Welcome to the Club" has been played at many events and clubs all around the world. The song's video mix has also proven popular with listeners. Another well-liked song that many other artists have remixed is "Ravers Fantasy".

The energetic song "Colours of the Rainbow" has become a favorite among fans of electronic music and has been included in a number of dance games. Another song that has become famous is "Heaven" thanks to its upbeat lyrics and appealing melody. Fans of the genre have also enjoyed this track's Cascada Radio Edit.

Manian's music is renowned for its upbeat rhythms, captivating melodies, and appealing lyrics. The song "Don't Stop the Dancing" is a perfect illustration of this because it is frequently played on electronic music playlists. The songs "Loco" and "Odysee" are two more examples of Manian's ability to produce lively, danceable music.

Last but not least, Manian is responsible for some of the most well-known electronic music compositions, such as "Welcome to the Club," "Ravers Fantasy," and "Colours of the Rainbow." His songs are well-liked by followers of the genre thanks to their upbeat beats, engaging melodies, and memorable lyrics.

Over the years, German musician Manian, who is well-known for his electronic, hardstyle, and hardcore music, has put out a lot of songs and albums. "Hands Up Forever," his most recent album, was published in 2013 and includes songs like "Welcome To The Club," "Loco," and "Sound Of My Dream." This album has Manian's distinct sound, which combines upbeat beats, earworm melodies, and inspirational words. This album will appeal to fans of electronic and hardstyle music and is likely to get them dancing.

"Turn the Tide (Dan Winter X Chris Diver Bounce Remix)," Manian's most recent single, was released in 2022. This song is a remix of the well-known hit and has a modern vibe that will appeal to electronic and hardstyle music listeners. Manian has also recently released the tracks "Ravers in the UK (E-Legal Remix)," "Ravers Fantasy (Yusef Kifah Remix)," and "Ravers in the UK (Reloaded)." All of these songs are quite energizing and great for starting a party.

Fans all over the world adore Manian's music for its dynamism, earworm melodies, and upbeat emotions. Manian's music will get you moving whether you're a die-hard listener of electronic music or you're just searching for something to dance to. Fans are eager to hear what he has in store for them next as he pushes the limits of electronic and hardstyle music with his most recent album and singles.

German musician Manian has worked with a number of musicians in the electronic and hardstyle/hardcore music genres. With DJ Gollum, he produced one of his most well-known songs, "Welcome To The Club - DJ Gollum Radio Edit." The song is a favorite in clubs because of its catchy chorus and upbeat sounds. For the song "Don't Stop The Dancing," Carlprit and I worked together in another noteworthy collaboration. The song features upbeat lyrics and a pleasant attitude, and when mixed with Manian's music style, it is the ideal dancefloor anthem.

Manian co-wrote the song "Colours of the Rainbow" with the Italian dance group ItaloBrothers. The song features an exuberant speed and a chorus that is instantly recognizable as ItaloBrothers' music. In addition, Manian and Cascada worked together on the song "Heaven - Cascada Radio Edit." The song is a favorite on radio stations and in clubs because of its fast speed and appealing tune.

Finally, Floorfilla and Manian worked together on the song "Just Another Night (Anthem 4) - Video Edit." The song has a powerful beat and a lot of intensity, which is typical of Floorfilla's music. Overall, these partnerships have aided Manian in expanding his fan base and solidifying his position as a well-liked musician in the Electronic, Hardstyle/Hardcore music genre.
